title: Top 10 Things to Remember + Second Year Studs - Fantasy Football Podcast for 2/24
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason deliver 10 important lessons learned from the 2021 fantasy football season! Plus, which second-year player will make the biggest jump in year two? Don’t miss this important offseason episode! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for February 24th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(05:00) - Quick Question: Second Year Studs
(11:15) - NFL News
(15:10) - 10 Things to Remember from 2021
(15:55) - Hurt Don’t Help
(19:15) - Plumb the Depths
(22:30) - Late Round Adjustment
(26:40) - Quarter-blehcs
(30:45) - Proof was in the Pudding!
(34:20) - Rookie QBs Give WRs the Heebie Jeebies
(40:20) - Tight Ends? More Like Loose Stools!
(42:40) - New Laundry, New Problems
(46:00) - Rookie Fever
(50:50) - The Future is Bright

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
